exchange(uint256,uint256,bool).details: Exchanges sellAmount of sellToken in exchange for at least minBuyAmount of buyToken Requires the sellAmount to have been approved to the exchangeThis function can be frozen using the Freezable interface.

params.minBuyAmount: The minimum amount of buyToken the user has to receive for this transaction to succeed
params.sellAmount: The amount of sellToken the user is selling to the exchange
params.sellGold: `true` if gold is the sell token

exchange(uint256,uint256,bool).return: The amount of buyToken that was transfered

params.sellGold: `true` if gold is the sell token

getBuyTokenAmount(uint256,bool).details: Returns the amount of buyToken a user would get for sellAmount of sellToken

params.sellAmount: The amount of sellToken the user is selling to the exchange
params.sellGold: `true` if gold is the sell token

getSellTokenAmount(uint256,bool).details: Returns the amount of sellToken a user would need to exchange to receive buyAmount of buyToken.

params.buyAmount: The amount of buyToken the user would like to purchase.
params.sellGold: `true` if gold is the sell token

params._minimumReports: The minimum number of fresh reports that need to be present in the oracle to update buckets commit to the gold bucket
params._reserveFraction: Fraction to commit to the gold bucket
params._updateFrequency: The time period that needs to elapse between bucket updates
params.registryAddress: The address of the registry core smart contract.

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.newMininumReports: The new update minimum number of reports required

params.registryAddress: The address of a registry contract for routing to other contracts.

params.newReserveFraction: The new value for the reserve fraction

params.newSpread: The new value for the spread

params.newStableToken: The new address for Stable Token

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: Contract that allows to exchange StableToken for GoldToken and vice versa using a Constant Product Market Maker Model

getBuyAndSellBuckets(bool).notice: Returns the buy token and sell token bucket sizes, in order. The ratio of the two also represents the exchange rate between the two.

initialize(address,address,uint256,uint2.notice: Used in place of the constructor to allow the contract to be upgradable via proxy.

setMinimumReports(uint256).notice: Allows owner to set the minimum number of reports required

setRegistry(address).notice: Updates the address pointing to a Registry contract.

setReserveFraction(uint256).notice: Allows owner to set the Reserve Fraction

setSpread(uint256).notice: Allows owner to set the spread

setStableToken(address).notice: Allows owner to set the Stable Token address

setUpdateFrequency(uint256).notice: Allows owner to set the update frequency
